title: Major service disruption between Tuas Link and Tuas West Road

updates.text: [EWL] UPDATE: Train svc btwn #TuasLink and #TuasWestRoad has resumed. Free regular bus and bridging bus services have ceased.

[EWL]: Due to a factory fire near #TuasLink, there is no train svc btwn #TuasLink and #TuasWestRoad. Free regular bus and bridging bus services are available btwn #TuasLink and #TuasWestRoad.  Train service is still available.
